extendedInfo.description: Simply press the Shuffle button to find scenic 360-degree panoramas from around the USA, Canada, Mexico and Brazil.This free app lets you get a taste for Street View shuffling before buying one of the premium apps.Upgrade to the full version to enable the following features:â¢ Discover scenic panoramas in 32 areas across the Americasâ¢ Find a street view by typing in an addressâ¢ Show a street view of your current locationâ¢ Share a street view via email or TwitterThe photo used in the feature image is courtesy of Flickr user Werner Kunz (werkunz). The image is used in accordance with the Attribution-ShareAlike 2.0 Generic (CC BY-SA 2.0) license.
